Victor (Colin Farrell), a professional assassin, is seduced and blackmailed by Beatrice (Noomi Rapace), a victim of a car accident to seek revenge. Together they perform a plan macabre against the powerful gangster who he works for and that, years ago, was responsible for the death of his wife and daughter.
